job_tasks.phrase: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems, apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short, and then close the gap by improving the AI system
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the integration of human expertise with AI systems to resolve issues and improve the AI itself, which falls under improving existing systems and integrating different capabilities.

job_tasks.phrase: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback and participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
job_tasks.justification: This directly relates to the process of improving AI models through feedback and participation in fine-tuning sessions, which is a core aspect of model development.

job_tasks.phrase: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies
job_tasks.justification: Prototyping and testing new AI tools and methodologies falls under the development and experimentation phase of AI models.

job_tasks.phrase: Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support, focusing on complex issues that AI cannot yet fully resolve
job_tasks.justification: This describes the integration of human and AI capabilities into a support system, aligning with software development and integration tasks.

soft_skills.phrase: Taking two whole months to get up to speed; you will be expected to ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
soft_skills.justification: This highlights the expectation of rapid learning and adaptation to new products, fitting the 'Learning & Adaptability' category.

soft_skills.phrase: Relying on your managers for help; if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role
soft_skills.justification: This emphasizes the need for self-sufficiency and problem-solving skills, which aligns with the 'Problem Solving & Pragmatism' category.

profile.rationale: The role involves analyzing and improving AI systems, participating in AI model fine-tuning, and integrating AI capabilities into customer support. While there's an element of AI specialization (fine-tuning, improving AI), the primary focus is on the application and integration of AI within a support system, rather than core AI model development or deep generative AI tasks. The tasks lean more towards using and enhancing existing AI within a software context, fitting the 'AI-Adjacent Software Engineer' profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines responsibilities related to AI integration and improvement within a customer support context. While it mentions AI model fine-tuning, it doesn't delve into deep AI research or complex model building, making the 'AI-Adjacent Software Engineer' profile a strong fit. The confidence is high, but not perfect, as the term 'Application Support Engineer' could imply a broader scope, but the detailed bullet points clarify the AI focus.
